definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Our safe service is for stay-in guests only.
sentences.chinese: 我们的保险箱只为住店客人提供服务。

sentences.english: Provide in-room safe deposit boxes service.
sentences.chinese: 提供客房内保险箱之服务。
保险箱能有效制止盗贼。

sentences.english: You should lock the jewels in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 你应把珠宝首饰锁起妥藏在保险箱内。

sentences.english: I must just remind you to lock the safe.
sentences.chinese: 我一定得提醒您把保险箱锁上。

sentences.english: She kept her jewels in her safe deposit box.
sentences.chinese: 她将她珠宝放在她银行保险箱。

sentences.english: I took the precaution of locking money in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 我把所有的钱都锁在保险箱里以防万一。

sentences.english: In no circumstances must you forget to lock the safe.
sentences.chinese: 您无论如何不能忘了锁保险箱的门。

sentences.english: There were no safe deposit boxes, either in guerrilla areas or in the rear.
sentences.chinese: 可是在游击区和后方基地没有保险箱。

sentences.english: We don't know how it got into the safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道它是怎么进入保险箱的。

sentences.english: she kept her jewels in her safe-deposit box.
sentences.chinese: 她将宝石放在她银行保险箱。

sentences.english: She fail to unlock the safe in spite of all her exertion.
sentences.chinese: 她虽然费尽力气，仍未能将那保险箱的锁打开。

sentences.english: Then he locked it in the safe at his house.
sentences.chinese: 然后他就把花瓶锁在保险箱里了。

sentences.english: If you want to use the locker, please re-set the password.
sentences.chinese: 如果您需要使用保险箱，请重新设置密码。

sentences.english: The suspects' fingerprints on the safe were considered incontrovertible evidence that he had participated in the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 保险箱上嫌疑人的手纹被认为是他参与了抢劫的铁证。

sentences.english: I took the precaution of locking everything in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 我把一切东西都锁在保险箱里以防万一。
